name: cookiesplease
title: Cookies Please
description: This is a very simple plugin for dealing with the EU's guidelines on Cookies. It does only one job: attempt to set a single cookie with the user's cookie preference. This cookie can be used (in conjunction with jquery.cookie, a dependency of this plugin) by other scripts to find out if they can/should use cookies. It can even be used to determine whether other scripts can be loaded at all.
